body.p: STS security is based on the identification of each user by a PIN with an associated password. The PIN identifies the user and the password allows access. This scheme also provides a login history and accurate forensics if there is problem with the STS.

To initially set up STS users, Eaton PDI provides a temporary Administrator PIN and password. The administrator should:
Log in on the Home screen in the Operator panel.
Navigate to the Users screen
Change the administrator PIN and password and then keep them secure.
Set up each userâ€™s security information as described in the following sections.
After initial startup, commissioning, testing, or restart, the administrator should clear any alarms that occurred.
